If you're in the mood for a burger or salad I highly recommend this place.  Service is friendly and fast.  Food is great.  I ordered the Jamaican chicken salad - it comes with dark meat chicken which is the most tender chicken I've ever tasted.  Combine that with the avocado, kalamata olives and dressing makes this salad one of the best I've ever tasted.  My friend order the "dude" burger and said it was great as well.  We shared an order of their garlic / parmesan fries - yum! I want to go back.  The wait staff is very attentive.
